thread.title: Missing 12-year-old from Salt Spring Island may be in Victoria/Sooke | CTV Vancouver Island News
thread.title_full: Missing 12-year-old from Salt Spring Island may be in Victoria/Sooke | CTV Vancouver Island News

author: CTV Vancouver Island
title: Missing 12-year-old from Salt Spring Island may be in Victoria/Sooke | CTV Vancouver Island News
text:
A missing 12-year-old boy from Salt Spring Island may be in the Victoria or Sooke area, according to RCMP.
Police say Domonic Bogaardt was reported missing by a family member on Monday around 10 a.m.
Officials believe he may have taken the ferry to Victoria and could be in contact with people in Victoria or Sooke.
Bogaardt is described as 5’5”, 130 pounds, has dirty blond hair and was wearing a black shirt, jeans, a backpack and a black hat.
He may have been riding a bicycle.
Anyone who sees Bogaardt or has any information is asked to contact Salt Spring Island RCMP at 250-537-5555.
